title: Troubleshoot Library Database Access
description: A student is off-campus and cannot access a required academic journal database through the library website.

tasks.description: Identify the student and the specific database they are trying to access (e.g., JSTOR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and the resource they need.

tasks.description: Guide the student on how to log in through the university's proxy server for off-campus access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions for using the proxy login portal.

tasks.description: If the issue persists, verify there are no known outages with the proxy server or the database provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks system status pages and confirms no widespread issues.
